Motion.desc: The current velocity of the entity

Rotation.desc: A list of [horizontal (0 to 360),vertical (-90 to 90)] rotation values.

FallDistance.desc: The number of blocks the entity has fallen

Fire.desc: Ticks left for the entity to burn

Air.desc: Ticks left for the entity before it starts drowning

OnGround.desc: Whether this entity is standing on the ground

NoGravity.desc: Set to true to disable the entity's gravity

Invulnerable.desc: When true, the entity will not take damage

PortalCooldown.desc: Ticks left before the entity can go through a portal

UUID.desc: This entity's Universally Unique IDentifier. The 128-bit UUID is stored as four 32-bit integers, ordered from most to least significant.

Silent.desc: When true, the entity will not make any sounds

Passengers.desc: Entities that are riding this entity.

Glowing.desc: True to make the entity glow and be visible through blocks

Tags.desc: Custom tags assigned to the entity. Can be changed with @<selector>.tag/untag(<tag>)

CustomName.desc: A custom name for this entity. Shown above their head and in death messages

CustomNameVisible.desc: When true, the custom name of this entity will always be visible above their head

VisibleName.desc: Sets a custom name for this entity and makes it always visible

Health.desc: Amount of health the entity has

AbsorptionAmount.desc: Amount of extra health added by Absorption effect

HurtTime.desc: Number of ticks the mob turns red for after being hit. 0 when not recently hit.

DeathTime.desc: Number of ticks the mob has been dead for. Controls death animations. 0 when alive.

FallFlying.desc: When true, causes a non-player entity to automatically fall when wearing an Elytra. Can be used to detect whether a player is gliding.

Attributes.desc: A list of Attributes for this mob, to control movement speed, max health, etc.

Base.desc: The base value of this attribute

Modifiers.desc: A list of modifiers to apply to this attribute

Amount.desc: The amount by which to modify the base value of the attribute

Operation.desc: Defines the operation this modifier executes on the attribute's base value

ActiveEffects.desc: The list of potion effects on this mob

Team.desc: The team the entity should be in. Can only used when creating the entity, as it is not saved in its data.

Dimension.desc: The ID of the dimension the player is in

SelectedItemSlot.desc: The index of the selected item in the hotbar

SelectedItem.desc: The item the player is currently holding in his hotbar

SleepTimer.desc: The number of ticks the player had been in bed

foodLevel.desc: The hunger level of the player (0-20)

XpLevel.desc: The XP level of the player (number shown in the XP bar)

XpProgress.desc: The progress to the next XP level

XpTotal.desc: The total XP points the plater has

XpSeed.desc: The seed used for the next enchantments in the enchanting table

offhand.desc: The item in the player's offhand

EnderChest.desc: The items in the player ender chest

walkSpeed.desc: The speed the player can walk

flySpeed.desc: The speed the player can fly

flying.desc: Whether the player is currently flying

CanBuild.desc: Whether the player can place or break blocks

instabuild.desc: Whether the player can instantly break blocks (like in creative)

LeftParrot.desc: The parrot entity in the left shoulder

RightParrot.desc: The parrot entity in the right shoulder

DeathLootTable.desc: A loot table to be dropped when this mob is killed

DeathLootTableSeed.desc: Seed for generating the death loot table

CanPickUpLoot.desc: Whether this mob can pick up dropped items

NoAI.desc: True to disable this mob's AI, so it won't move

PersistenceRequired.desc: When true, the mob will not despawn naturally

LeftHanded.desc: True if the mob should be left handed

BatHanging.desc: True when the bat is hanging upside down from a block, and false when its flying

InLove.desc: Number of ticks until the mob loses its breeding hearts and stops searching for a mate. 0 when not searching for a mate.

Age.desc: The age of the mob in ticks. When negative, the mob is a baby.

ForcedAge.desc: A value modifying the age to speed up growth. Incremented when the animal is fed

LoveCause.desc: The UUID of the player that caused this animal to breed

CatType.desc: The ID of the cat's skin (more info: https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Cat/DV)

IsChickenJockey.desc: Whether this chicken is a chicken jockey (a baby zombie riding it). This also allows the chicken to despawn and drop 10 xp when killed.

EggLayTime.desc: Number of ticks until the chicken lays its egg. When reaches 0, the chicken lays the egg and this is set to a random number between 6000 - 12000

FromBucket.desc: Whether the fish was spawned from a bucket, and thus should not despawn

charged.desc: True if the creeper is charged from a lightning

Fuse.desc: Ticks until the creeper explodes. Defaults to 30.

ignited.desc: Whether the creeper should start exploding

TreasurePos.desc: The dolphin's destination position when leading a player to treasure

GotFish.desc: True if the dolphin got fish from a player

CanFindTreasure.desc: True if this dolphin can lead a player to treasure

Tamed.desc: True if the horse is tamed

HasChest.desc: True if this horse has a chest

IsBaby.desc: Whether this zombie is a baby

CanBreakDoors.desc: True if this zombie can break doors

DragonPhase.desc: The ID of the dragon's current state

carriedBlockState.desc: The block the enderman is holding

Lifetime.desc: How long this endermite has existed for. Despawns when this reaches 2400 (2 minutes)

PlayerSpawned.desc: Whether the endermite was spawned by a player, and thus endermen should attack it.

Patrolling.desc: Whether this raider entity has spawned in a pillager patrol.

CanJoinRaid.desc: True if this raider can join raids. Is normally set to false for witches.

PatrolLeader.desc: True if this raider is the patrol's leader

PatrolTarget.desc: The XYZ target of the patrol

RaidId.desc: The ID of the raid this mob belongs to

Wave.desc: The wave index in the raid this mob spawned in

SpellTicks.desc: Ticks until this mob can cast its spell

Trusted.desc: The UUIDs of the players the fox trusts. Only the first and last UUIDs are used.

Sleeping.desc: True if the fox is sleeping

Sitting.desc: True if the fox is sitting

Crouching.desc: True if the fox is crouching

ExplosionPower.desc: The radius of the explosion created by the fireballs this ghast fires. Defaults to 1.

CannotBeHunted.desc: If true, this hoglin will not be attacked by piglins

IsBaby.desc: If true, this zoglin is a baby

ArmorItem.desc: The armor the horse is wearing

HorseVariant.desc: The horse color and marking type

PlayerCreated.desc: True if this iron golem was spawned by a player using iron blocks and a pumpkin

LlamaVariant.desc: The skin type of the llama

Type.desc: The type of mooshroom this is

EffectId.desc: The type of effect this brown mooshroom gives to a suspicious stew

EffectDuration.desc: The duration of the effect the brown mooshroom gives in a suspicious stew

Trusting.desc: Whether this ocelot is trusting players

MainGene.desc: The primary gene this panda has. Used to control its behaviour. Weak and Brown genes are not dominant, so both the main and the hidden gene has to be the same for it to be used.

HiddenGene.desc: The secondary gene this panda has. Has a chance to be inherited to this panda's child.

ParrotVariant.desc: The color variant of this parrot

CirclingPos.desc: The position of this phantom's circling center

Size.desc: The size of the phantom. Naturally spawned phantoms are always size 0.

IsBaby.desc: If true, this piglin is a baby

CannotHunt.desc: If true, this piglin cannot attack hoglin

PuffState.desc: The puffiness value of this pufferfish

RabbitType.desc: The skin of the rabbit. When not present, defaults to the Toast skin

RoarTick.desc: The Ravager's roar roar attack cooldown

Sheared.desc: True if the sheep is sheared

Peek.desc: Height of the shulker's head peeking

AttachFace.desc: The direction this shulker is facing

Color.desc: The shulker's color. If unspecified, the default purple color is used.

SkeletonTrap.desc: True if this skeleton horse is a skeleton trap

SkeletonTrapTime.desc: Ticks this skeleton horse has existed if it's a skeleton trap. When reaches 18000, it despawns.

Size.desc: Determines the slime's size. Also controls the attack damage. Natural spawned values are 0, 1 and 3.

wasOnGround.desc: True if the slime was touching the ground

Pumpkin.desc: Whether this snow golem is wearing a pumpkin

DespawnDelay.desc: Time until this trader llama despawns

BodyColor.desc: The color of the tropical fish body

PatternColor.desc: The color of the tropical fish pattern

HasEgg.desc: True if the turtle has an egg

LifeTicks.desc: Ticks left before the vex takes damage, and is set back to 20.

Willing.desc: True if the villager wants to breed. Set to true after some trades, and set to false after breeding.

LastRestock.desc: The last time the villager worked at their workstation

LastGossipDecay.desc: The last time the villager decreased all gossip values

RestocksToday.desc: The number of times the villager restocked in the current minecraft day

MeetingPoint.desc: The position of the bell block this villager should go to in the meeting time

Home.desc: The position of this villager's bed

JobSite.desc: The position of this villager's workstation

LastSlept.desc: The time this villager has last slept in a bed

LastWoken.desc: The time this villager last woken up from his bed

LastWorked.desc: The time this villager has last worked at his workstation

Johnny.desc: When true, the vindicator will attack any mob except ghasts and other illagers

DespawnDelay.desc: Time in ticks until the wandering trader despawns

WanderTarget.desc: The destination the wandering trader goes to

InvulnerableTime.desc: Time in ticks left for the wither to be invulnerable

Angry.desc: True if the wolf is angry

DrownedConversionTime.desc: The number of ticks until the zombie converts into a drowned or a husk to a zombie.

InWaterTime.desc: The number of ticksthe zombie has been underwater. Used for starting the drowning conversion.

Anger.desc: Ticks until the zombie pigman becomes neutral again after angering on a player.

HurtBy.desc: The UUID of the lasdt player that attacked this zombie pigman

ConversionTime.desc: Time in ticks until the zombie villager converts back to a villager

ConversionPlayer.desc: The UUID of the player who started curing this zombie villager

Owner.desc: The UUID of the entity who shot this projectile

inGround.desc: Whether the projectile is stuck into the ground

pickup.desc: The pickup status of the projectile

life.desc: Increments each tick if the projectile is in the ground. When reaches 1200, it despawns. Resets when it leaves the ground.

damage.desc: Amount of damage this projectile deals when hits an entity

crit.desc: Whether this projectile deals critical damage

ShotFromCrossbow.desc: Whether this arrow projectile was shot from a crossbow

PierceLevel.desc: The piercing level of the arrow, if shot from a crossbow with the Piercing enchantment

SoundEvent.desc: The sound that plays when the projectile hits

Color.desc: The potion color for the arrow particles

CustomPotionEffects.desc: Custom effects this arrow gives when hitting an entity

Potion.desc: The ID of the default potion effect this arrow contains

power.desc: List of 3 doubles that add to the Motion, to accelerate

Item.desc: The item this projectile is rendered as. For potions, this is also the potion item
A custom item to be rendered instead of the default item

ExplosionPower.desc: The radius of explosion this fireball causes

Steps.desc: How many steps it takes to reach the bullet's target. The higher the value, the longer of a path it takes towards the target.

Target.desc: The UUID of the target entity of the bullet

TravelDir.desc: The offset in X, Y and Z to travel

Duration.desc: The time in ticks that the glowing effect persists

Trident.desc: The trident item that was used

DealtDamage.desc: Whether the trident has already damaged an entity, so it won't deal damage to more entities

Age.desc: The number of ticks the orb exists. When it reaches 6000, the orb despawns.

Health.desc: The HP of the orb. When reaches 0 the orb is destroyed.

Value.desc: The amount of experience the orb gives when it's picked up

Age.desc: The number of ticks the item exists. When it reaches 6000, the item despawns. Setting to -32768 will prevent it from despawning.

Health.desc: The HP of the item entity. When reaches 0 the item is destroyed.

PickupDelay.desc: The number of ticks until the item can be picked up. Setting to 32767 will prevent it from ever be picked up.

Owner.desc: Only the player with this UUID can pick up the item

Thrower.desc: The player who dropped this item

Item.desc: The item stack this entity holds

Type.desc: The wood type of this boat

CustomDisplayTile.desc: Whether to display the DisplayState block inside the minecart

DisplayState.desc: A custom block state to display inside the minecart

DisplayOffset.desc: The offset of the custom displayed block, in pixels.

Items.desc: The items stored in this container minecart

LootTable.desc: A loot table to be generated when opening this minecart's container

LootTableSeed.desc: A seed for the loot table's RNG

PushX.desc: Force along the X axis created from giving coal to the furnace

PushZ.desc: Force along the Z axis created from giving coal to the furnace

Fuel.desc: The number of ticks until the minecart runs out of fuel

TransferCooldown.desc: Time until the next item transfer, in ticks. Can be between 0-8

Enabled.desc: Whether or not the hopper is enabled. Is set to false when the minecart is activated by an activator rail.

BlockState.desc: The block represented by this falling block

TileEntityData.desc: Data of the tile entity carried by this falling block

Time.desc: The number of ticks the falling block has existed. When reaches 600, it vanishes.

DropItem.desc: Whether to drop the block as an item when broken by falling on a non-full block.

HurtEntities.desc: Whether to damage entities when falling on them

FallHurtMax.desc: The maximum damage this falling block can deal when falling on an entity

FallHurtAmount.desc: The damage to deal per block distance this block is falling. Maximum damage is set with 'FallHurtMax'.

Fuse.desc: Ticks until the TNT explodes. Defaults to 80 when a TNT block is ignited.

Age.desc: Time the area effect cloud existed. When reaches WaitTime + Duration, the cloud disappears.

Color.desc: The color of the displayed spell particles

Duration.desc: The time this cloud can exist after the WaitTime is over

ReapplicationDelay.desc: The number of ticks before reapplying the effect

WaitTime.desc: Total time in ticks before the effect field is created

DurationOnUse.desc: Amount to modify the duration by after the effect is applied

Owner.desc: The owner of this area effect cloud

RadiusOnUse.desc: Amount to modify the radius by after the effect is applied

RadiusPerTick.desc: Amount to modify the radius by every tick

Particle.desc: The particle to display as the effect

Potion.desc: The name of the effect potion type

Effects.desc: The effects to apply to any entity who enter this cloud

Marker.desc: If true, the armor stand will have no hitbox

Invisible.desc: If true, the armor stand will not be visible. Items it's holding will still be visible.

NoBasePlate.desc: If true, the armor stand will not have a base beneath it

Pose.desc: Rotation values for the armor stand's pose

Body.desc: The xyz rotation of the main body

LeftArm.desc: The xyz rotation of the left arm

RightArm.desc: The xyz rotation of the right arm

LeftLeg.desc: The xyz rotation of the left leg

RightLeg.desc: The xyz rotation of the right leg

Head.desc: The xyz rotation of the head

ShowArms.desc: If true, the armor stand will have its arms visible

Small.desc: If true, the armor stand will be small

DisabledSlots.desc: Describes which slots can be placed an item in, change the item or remove the item

ShowBottom.desc: Whether to show the bedrock plate at the bottom of the crystal

BeamTarget.desc: The target pos of the beam

Warmup.desc: Ticks until the fangs rise from the ground

Owner.desc: The entity who created this fang. Usually the evoker's UUID.

Item.desc: The item this eye of ender is rendered as. Defaults to an eye of ender if absent.

Life.desc: The number of ticks the firework is flying for

LifeTime.desc: The total number of ticks this firework should fly for. Randomized based on the flight duration of the firework item.

ShotAtAngle.desc: Whether the firework was shot from a crossbow

Facing.desc: The direction the frame is facing

Item.desc: The item stack held by this item frame

ItemDropChance.desc: The chance of the item to drop when the frame breaks

ItemRotation.desc: The number of times the item has been rotated 45deg clockwise

Invisible.desc: True to make this frame invisible

Fixed.desc: True to prevent this frame from breaking or changing its item

Facing.desc: The direction the painting is facing

Image.desc: The name of the painting image

Owner.desc: The UUID of the player who owns this mob

Sitting.desc: True if the mob is sitting

CollarColor.desc: The color of this cat/wolf collar

Temper.desc: The higher this value is, this horse is easier to tame. Increased by feeding.

Saddled.desc: Whether this mob has a saddle

Offers.desc: The offers this villager can be traded for. Generated when the villager is clicked on.

rewardExp.desc: Whether this trades gives XP reward for buying this trade

maxUses.desc: Maximum number of times this trade can be used before it is locked

uses.desc: Number of times this trade has been bought

buy.desc: The first item the player should give

buyB.desc: The second item the player should give

sell.desc: The item the villager is giving back to the player

xp.desc: How much experience the villager gets when this trade has been used

priceMultiplier.desc: A value that adjusts the 'demand' value

specialPrice.desc: A value added to the first 'buy' item

demand.desc: A value multiplied by the 'priceMultiplier' value and added to the price of the first 'buy' item

level.desc: The villager's current level. Controls what trades are available.

Gossips.desc: The villager's gossiping data. Villagers share those values when they meet.

Type.desc:
The ID of the gossip type. 
major_negative: Created when another villager nearby is killed by a player
minor_negative: Created when a player attacks this villager
major_positive and minor_positive: Created when this villager has been cured from a zombie villager
trading: Created when the player trades with this villager.

Value.desc: The value associated with this gossip. All gossip types except major_positive are sharing this value and it decays every once in a while.

Target.desc: The UUID of the player who caused this gossip

Xp.desc: Amount of XP the villager has. Increased when trading and affects the villager's level.

IsImmuneToZombification.desc: If true, this hoglin/piglin will not transform to a zombified version.

TimeInOverworld.desc: The time in ticks this mob has been in the overworld. When reaches 300, it will be zombified
